item.title: Windump的详细用法
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: Npcapnmap/npcap: Nmap Project's packet sniffing library for Windows, based on WinPcap/Libpcap improved with NDIS 6 and LWF. "WinDump 3.9.5.exe" -D "WinDump 3.9.5.exe" -i 1 -s 1024 -B 4096-w windump.pcap REM -v 输出一个稍微详细的信息，例如在ip包中可以包括ttl和服务类型的信息； REM -vv 输出
